story_arceus_03_07000/2401_1001_0200_10:
“this man rejected everything other than himself
in order to bring about one singular justice...”
story_arceus_03_07000/2401_1001_0300_10:
That’s what I felt when you first came to
challenge us.
story_arceus_03_07000/2401_1001_0500_10: I don’t sense any sadness now!
story_arceus_03_07000/2401_1001_0600_10:
I suppose if you’re going to write a sequel,
you may as well give it a happy twist!
story_arceus_03_07000/2401_1001_0700_10: Now then, allow me to reintroduce myself.
story_arceus_03_07000/2401_1001_0800_10:
I’m the Elite Four’s Ghost-type Pokémon user,
Shauntal, and I shall be your opponent.
story_arceus_03_07000/2401_1001_0900_10:
A Psychic-type Pokémon? That’ll play right to our
advantage!
story_arceus_03_07000/2401_1001_1500_10:
I should’ve known. You used that trick on me
before!
story_arceus_03_07000/2401_1001_2000_10: You’re even greater than I thought!
